name: Professor Ann Droid's Wacky Factory
description:
Created for Mini-Jam 63: Future!

Professor Ann Droid's Factory is under attack! Help her defend it by blasting those invading robots with your puzzle skills. Can you defeat those malicious machines, or will you be beaten by a bot?

Controls:
Move Piece - WASD/D-Pad
Rotate - J/Xbox A/DualShock X and K/Xbox B/DualShock O
Hold (when available) - L/Xbox X/DualShock ◻

Credits:
Programming/Design: Witchs_Hex (Twitter: @WitchsHex)
Art: Krysta (Twitter: @KrystaYvisual)
Music: jamiep (Twitter @pamiejaige)
